name: Bodhi's Basics in Edutainmint an'd otter Stuff Reupload
name_original: Bodhi's Basics in Edutainmint an'd otter Stuff Reupload
description:
Bodhi's Basics in Edutainmint an'd otter Stuff Reupload is a game developed by Dima Dimon. It came out on 08-04-2021.
Bodhi's Basics in Edutainmint an'd otter Stuff Reupload is available on PC, macOS and Linux. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
